description:
ClearEstate’s mission is to empower estate executors by delivering transparent estate settlement and planning solutions through highly trained professionals and state-of-the-art technology.

We are looking for a licensed California attorney who is able to be our boots on the ground and assist a couple of our clients with a non-contested probate process in Honolulu and LA counties.

Since 2020, ClearEstate offers technology-enabled services, designed to handle all estate planning and settlement needs. We are building an end-to-end tech-enabled service to alleviate the procedural and emotional burdens of estate planning and settlement.

If you are a lawyer with a few hours on your hands and wish to be part of democratizing estate administration with us, we wanna hear from you!

If the assistance with this specific task goes well, there's an opportunity to assist us with other estate administration matters, some of which can be completed remotely!

Interested attorneys should send their cv to legal@clearestate.com

We look forward to hearing from you soon!
